FOOTER.DESCRIPTION: Al Maaly Gate Schools aim to achieve the highest quality level in education to build essential and necessary skills that enable our students to complete their university education.
FOOTER.COPYRIGHT: ©2026 Al Maaly Gate Schools, All rights reserved

PROGRAMS.TITLE: Our Programs
PROGRAMS.DESCRIPTION: We offer world-class educational programs based on the British curriculum, with innovative learning methods and diverse assessment techniques, to enhance students' academic and personal skills and prepare them for a successful future with confidence and competence.

PROGRAM_1.TITLE: Graduation Exams and Certificates
PROGRAM_1.DESCRIPTION: Through an organized exam system and accredited certificates, we ensure fair assessment that grants the student a certificate that opens future horizons with confidence.

PROGRAM_2.TITLE: Continuous Monitoring and Aptitude Tests
PROGRAM_2.DESCRIPTION: Continuous monitoring and aptitude tests ensure accurate measurement of student level and support their development with confidence and continuity.

PROGRAM_3.TITLE: Effective and High-Quality Learning Methods
PROGRAM_3.DESCRIPTION: Effective and high-quality learning methods ensure deeper understanding and continuous development for students.

PARTNERS.TITLE: Success Partners
PARTNERS.DESCRIPTION: We are proud to collaborate with innovative companies from around the world. Our partners help us deliver exceptional solutions to our customers.

HERO.TITLE_Part2: Discover Our New Remote Learning Platform in the Arab World
HERO.SUBTITLE: our new remote learning platform in the Arab world

CURRICULUM.TITLE: Distinguished British Curriculum
CURRICULUM.DESCRIPTION: A distinguished British curriculum with global educational standards, focusing on understanding, critical thinking, and building future skills.

EDUCATION_STYLE.TITLE: New Educational Style
EDUCATION_STYLE.DESCRIPTION: A new educational style that meets learners' needs, offering innovative methods that enhance understanding and make a real difference in the learning experience.

DIGITAL_EDUCATION.TITLE: Modern and Up-to-Date Digital Education
DIGITAL_EDUCATION.DESCRIPTION: Modern digital education that keeps pace with development, providing a smart learning experience that integrates modern technologies to enhance understanding and facilitate effective skill acquisition.

CONTACT.TITLE: Contact Us
CONTACT.SUBTITLE: We are always happy to receive your inquiries or complaints

ADDRESS.LABEL: Address
ADDRESS.VALUE: Al-Qassim - Buraydah - Old Airport - Al-Wahda Street

ERRORS.MIN_LENGTH_NAME: Name must be at least 3 characters
ERRORS.MIN_LENGTH_MESSAGE: Message must be at least 10 characters

VISION.TITLE: Our Vision
VISION.CONTENT: Al Maaly Gate Schools aim to achieve the highest quality level in education to build essential and necessary skills that enable our students to complete their university education.

MISSION.TITLE: Our Mission
MISSION.CONTENT: To provide educational programs with international foundations and standards at an excellent quality level through a global British curriculum within an educational environment characterized by organization, security, positivity, and enrichment.

PHILOSOPHY.TITLE: Our Philosophy
ITEMS: Full awareness that every student has their own learning style.

SUB_ITEMS: Learning strategies centered around activating the student's role.
Various assessment techniques and methods that suit each student's learning style to enhance the learning process.

ITEMS: Creating an atmosphere of expected success to be achieved at a high level among the staff.
Showcasing student knowledge and skills through the use of logical thinking and problem-solving methods.
Building generations capable of keeping up with and responding to the changes of the era.
Student's ability to coexist in other countries, systems, schools, and universities where they have been enriched with the necessary knowledge, skills, and values - which is our entrusted goal.
Professional development to establish the idea of lifelong learning.
Belief in the fundamental role of parents in improving and supporting the learning process.

ABOUT.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT.DESCRIPTION: Al Maaly Gate Schools provide global education with a distinguished British curriculum in a safe and positive environment, enhancing thinking and problem-solving skills while keeping pace with the needs of the era. We believe in a unique learning style for each student and strive to build outstanding and flexible generations, supporting parents and developing educational staff to achieve a distinguished and sustainable learning experience.
